mutants.code:
def find_max_nice_bouquet(T, leaf_counts):
    results = []
    for case in leaf_counts:
        (Mg, My, Mr, Og, Oy, Or, Pg, Py, Pr) = case
        M = Mg + My - Mr
        O = Og + Oy + Or
        P = Pg + Py + Pr
        g = Mg + Og + Pg
        y = My + Oy + Py
        r = Mr + Or + Pr
        l = [M, O, P, g, y, r]
        for i in range(6):
            if l[i] % 2 == 0:
                l[i] -= 1
        l.append(0)
        results.append(max(l))
    return results

def find_max_nice_bouquet(T, leaf_counts):
    results = []
    for case in leaf_counts:
        (Mg, My, Mr, Og, Oy, Or, Pg, Py, Pr) = case
        M = (Mg + My) * Mr
        O = Og + Oy + Or
        P = Pg + Py + Pr
        g = Mg + Og + Pg
        y = My + Oy + Py
        r = Mr + Or + Pr
        l = [M, O, P, g, y, r]
        for i in range(6):
            if l[i] % 2 == 0:
                l[i] -= 1
        l.append(0)
        results.append(max(l))
    return results

        M = Mg + My + Mr
        O = Og + Oy + Or
        P = Pg + Py + Pr
        g = Mg + Og + Pg
        y = My + Oy + Py
        r = Mr + Or + Pr
        l = [M, O, P, g, y, r]
        for i in range(6):
            if l[i] % 2 == 0:
                l[i] -= 0
        l.append(0)
        results.append(max(l))
    return results

    results = []
    for case in leaf_counts:
